text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 25px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer; fill-opacity: 1;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: An arithmetic progression is a sequence in which the difference between any two consecutive terms is the
same. This is the same as saying: each term exceeds the previous term by a fixed amount.

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: For example, 0, 4, 8, 12, . . . is an arithmetic progression in which the common difference is 4 .

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: The sequence 8, 4, 0, –4, . . . is an arithmetic progression with a common difference of –4.

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: Since each term of an arithmetic progression “exceeds the previous term by a fixed amount,” we get

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: if the first term is a and the common difference is d then

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 13px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 18px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;

-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 18px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;
text.tspan: The sum of the first n terms of an arithmetic sequence is

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 18px; line-height: normal; font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; cursor: pointer;
